thread.title: Death investigation underway at Hollywood's iconic Magic Castle
thread.title_full: Death investigation underway at Hollywood's iconic Magic Castle

title: Death investigation underway at Hollywood's iconic Magic Castle
text:
KABC 
Patrol cars at a death investigation incident inside Hollywood's famous Magic Castle on Friday, Feb. 24, 2017. KABC Friday, February 24, 2017 10:46PM HOLLYWOOD HILLS, LOS ANGELES (KABC) -- A death investigation was underway Friday night at the famous Magic Castle in Hollywood Hills.Authorities responded to the Hollywood landmark in the 7000 block of Franklin Avenue shortly before 7:30 p.m., according to Los Angeles police.Authorities were calling the incident a death investigation. Further details surrounding the mystery were not disclosed.The Magic Castle is just one block away from where the Oscars will be handed out on Sunday. Related Topics:
